section.p: "An arrangement to meet a person or be at a place at a certain time" - Dictionary.com The scheduled time of the Encounter.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] appointmentTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time for the appointment of the scheduled visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] appointmentType with data type Code
Identifies the Type of visit. Possible values include: IHS; Contract; Tribal; VA; 638 program; VA; etc.
Contains zero or one [0..1] performer, where its type is Individual Provider

Contains exactly one [1..1] appointmentTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time for the appointment of the scheduled visit.

Contains exactly one [1..1] appointmentType with data type Code
Identifies the Type of visit. Possible values include: IHS; Contract; Tribal; VA; 638 program; VA; etc.
Contains zero or one [0..1] performer, where its type is Individual Provider
